taxon.author: (Hogg, 1896)
taxon.distribution: Australia (Northern Territory, New South Wales, Tasmania). Introduced to New Zealand

referenceObject.reference: Hogg, H. R. (1896). Araneidae. In: Spencer, B. (ed.) Report of the Horn expedition to central Australia. Part II. Zoology. Dulau and Co., London & Melville, Mullen and Slade, Melbourne, pp. 309-356, pl. 24.
